text: Several companies provide rail transport in Portugal. * Comboios de Portugal * Fertagus * Lisbon Metro * Porto Metro * Metro Transportes do Sul (light rail) Portugal is a member of the International Union of Railways (UIC). The UIC Country Code for Portugal is 94. There are rail links with Spain, which uses the same Iberian broad gauge. ==Network== Infraestruturas de Portugal is the rail network administrating company, taking over control from REFER on 1 June 2015.
